column3: A Dragon-type attack. It inflicts a set amount of damage, regardless of the target's type.
column4: A Dragon-type attack. It always inflicts a set amount of damage.
column6: Launches shock waves that always inflict 40 HP damage.
column7: The foe is hit with a shock wave that always inflicts 40-HP damage.
column8: The foe is stricken by a shock wave. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.
column9: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.
column10: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

column3: A Fire-type attack that lasts two to five turns. The target cannot move while surrounded by flames.
column4: A Fire-type attack that lasts two to five turns. The flames make the target unable to move.
column5: Traps foe in fire for 2-5 turns.
column6: Traps the foe in a ring of fire for 2 to 5 turns.
column7: The foe is trapped in an intense spiral of fire that rages two to five turns.
column8: Traps the target in a ring of fire for 2 to 5 turns.
column9: The foe becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for two to five turns.
column10: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

column3: Flashes a light that sharply raises Sp. Atk.
column4: The user flashes a light that sharply raises its Sp. Atk stat.
column5: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, sharply raising its Sp. Atk stat.
column6: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, drastically raising its Sp. Atk stat.
column7: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

column3: Attacks with a burst of light. May lower Sp. Def.

column6: The user lets loose a damaging burst of light. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.
